p.k: Busty stepmum Lexi wants nothing more than to take in some poolside sun in her skimpy bikini, but when she walks in on her stepson, Ricky, getting scolded by his domineering father, she decides a more sympathetic, boob-centred approach is in order. Teasing Ricky with her massive tits by the pool leads to a wild and clandestine fuck upstairs, and Lexi ends up getting soaked in a way that has nothing to do with swimming.
